Package com.flag4j.operations.dense_sparse.real

Class RealDenseSparseOperations

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.operations.dense_sparse.real.RealDenseSparseOperations
public class RealDenseSparseOperations extends Object
This class contains methods to apply common binary operations to a real dense matrix and to a real sparse matrix.

      src1 - First matrix in sum.
      src2 - Second matrix in sum.
      Returns:
      The result of the matrix addition.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the matrices do not have the same shape.
